EmailTemplate.name: WEX Salesforce Support Unassigned Escalation
EmailTemplate.subject: Case ID {!Case.Thread_Id} RE: {!Case.Subject} - Unassigned WEX Salesforce Support Case
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Case Number {!Case.CaseNumber} - Subject: {!Case.Subject} has been escalated to you because it has not yet been assigned and was opened at least one business day ago.
